name: Cairn: Mathair's Curse (Demo)
description:
When an ancient evil is awoken by a most certainly odd cult, a boy must venture from his home to save his home (and also the world...).



Cairn: Mathair's Curse is an RPG inspired by 90s JRPGs and Scottish culture. Explore a variety of interesting locations and fight strange and unusual enemies.

  • A deep-rooted conspiracy to unravel
    A plot centuries in the making threatens everyone in Albaness. Animals are leaving the forests, a secret organisation lurks in the dark, and people are going missing from their homes. It is only a matter of time before the world is swallowed in chaos. Who will uncover these mysteries?

  • Character-rich story
    A cast of weird and wonderful characters await. Meet family, friends and rivals as you explore the country of Albaness. Who will you meet?



  • A world filled with wild and wonderful locations
    Explore a large variety of hand-crafted locations, from quaint seaside villages to ancient underground caverns and secret high-tech lairs. Don't feel like the trip back? Catch a lift in the family campervan and return to previously explored locations. (In a campervan, did I mention campervan!?)



  • A quirky turn-based battle system
    Fight a host of unusual and wacky enemies (or allies, who knows), including wild roaming haggis', bewildered stop signs and an odd group of cultists bent on
    destroying the world. Use character unique skills to tip the balance and unleash devastation on your foes. Combine the skills of your friends to tactically defeat your enemies.



  • An original soundtrack
    A soundtrack hand-crafted for the world of Cairn. Bop to a variety of tracks from bouncing combat music to spooky exploration ambience and heartbreaking melodies.
